Key Match Events: Roelof van der Merwe caught David Miller off Brandon Glover to turn the game around
Colin Ackermann hit two sixes in the final over to finish with 41 not out off 26
Post-Match Reflections: Netherlands won by 13 runs, ending South Africa's World Cup hopes
The victory could mean a top-four finish in the group for Netherlands, and therefore an automatic spot in the next T20 World Cup
South Africa will have to deal with the despondency of being knocked out despite having everything under control
Miscellaneous Highlights: Johannesburg-born Roelof van der Merwe, who represented South Africa in two editions of the tournament, put a dagger in South African hearts with an incredible catch
The Myburgh boost at the top helped set a firm base for Netherlands' charge
Tom Cooper, with all his experience of playing in the BBL, kept up the tempo
Brandon Glover made his most impactful contribution yet, nipping out three big batters including Rilee Rossouw and dangerman Miller
